description:
Jikkai (lit. "Ten Commandments") is a 10-person group of powerful servants of http://anidb.net/ch96064 [Majin Ou] and the main opponent to http://anidb.net/ch70760 [Nanatsu no Taizai]. In order to keep his realm in order, Maijin Ou took half of his power, split it tenfold and gave a fragment to each member of the group.
The group initially featured all three sons of Maijin Ou: http://anidb.net/ch67152 [Meliodas], http://anidb.net/ch90458 [Estarossa], and http://anidb.net/ch90462 [Zeldris]. Following their defeat during the Holy War, the giant king, http://anidb.net/ch90464 [Drole] and, the fairy king, http://anidb.net/ch90461 [Gloxinia] also joined. After Meliodas` defection, he was replaced with a demon, http://anidb.net/ch96391 [Fraudrin].
name: Jikkai
